city.name: Berlin
city.description: Berlin is one of the few cities that is home to three UNESCO World Heritage Sites. It includes the famous Museumsinsel (Museum Island) and the Prussian palaces and gardens. The German capital was also awarded the accolade of 'UNESCO City of Design'.

favouriteSubjects.name: Agile Rapid Knowledge Acquisition
favouriteSubjects.description: Agile Acquisition is acquisition using agile or iterative development. Agile or Iterative Development, with respect to software: means acquisition pursuant to a methodology for delivering multiple, rapid, incremental capabilities to the user for operational use, evaluation, and feedback.

favouriteSubjects.name: Full Stack Web Development
favouriteSubjects.description: It is the process of developing both the frontend and backend of applications, Any application has a frontend (user-facing) component and a backend (database and logic) component. The frontend contains the user interface and code related to user interactions with the application.

favouriteSubjects.name: 4IR Advanced Bootcamp
favouriteSubjects.description: The 4IR Bootcamp initiative is tailored specifically to align career choices and studies of individuals to growing industries, relatively new.
